name: Easy PHILLY OREO Cheesecake
author: Philadelphia
summary: Easy to prepare, this cheesecake is a great dessert to bring to your next get-together.
ingredients: 3 (250 g) packages PHILADELPHIA Brick Cream Cheese, softened
directions: Place 16 of the cookies in resealable plastic bag
Flatten bag to remove excess air, then seal bag
Finely crush cookies by rolling a rolling pin across the bag
Press firmly onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan
Beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended
Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating just until blended after each addition
Gently stir half of the chopped cookies into cream cheese batter
Pour over prepared crust; sprinkle with the remaining chopped cookies
or until centre is almost set
